properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v8 v11 v12 v13 v14 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v8 v15 v16 v6 v7 v17 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v8 v18 v19 v20 v21 v22 v23 v24 v25 v26

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Surrendering

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It may look like weakness to you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: But that’s not the way it is

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I’m down on my knees, facing a truth

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: That the strength that I need is His.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: I’m not giving up

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: and I’m not giving in

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: I’m surrendering, surrendering

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: I’m dying to live

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: And I’m losing to win

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: I’ve been in this battle before

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: I’ve tasted defeat and I know

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: That at the end of myself there’s an open door

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: That is just the beginning of all

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: In placing God’s will, rejecting my all

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Forsaking my need, to be in control

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: I’m surrendering

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: All to Him I freely give

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: I will ever love and trust Him

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: In His presence daily live

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: I surrender all

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: To You Jesus, I surrender all

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: All to thee my blessed Saviour

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: I

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: Surrender all
